wardrobe.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a piece of furniture like a large cupboard that you hang clothes in
wardrobe.translation[0].definitions[0].n: fitted/built-in wardrobes (=wardrobes built against a wall or fitted between two walls)
wardrobe.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Can you hang these in the wardrobe, please?
wardrobe.translation[0].definitions[1].n: winter/summer etc wardrobe (=the clothes you have for a particular time of year)
wardrobe.translation[0].definitions[1].e: You can win a complete new wardrobe.
wardrobe.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a department in a theatre, television company etc that deals with the clothes worn by actors
